tyres.name: Primacy 3
tyres.description: With its excellent performance on wet roads(1), the MICHELIN Primacy 3 summer tyre was awarded by ADAC as best in its category in 2015 and 2018(7).

tyres.name: Primacy 4
tyres.description: The MICHELIN Primacy 4 tyre is designed for safety made to last(1) and excellent longevity(4)

tyres.name: Pilot Sport 4 SUV
tyres.description: The MICHELIN Pilot Sport 4 SUV tyre, designed for SUVs, provides a premium and comfortable experience, with high performance driving made to last.

tyres.name: Primacy 4 ST
tyres.description: The MICHELIN Primacy 4 summer tyre is designed for safety made to last(1) while providing a quiet and comfortable driving experience.

tyres.name: Pilot Sport 4
tyres.description: The MICHELIN Pilot Sport 4 tyre adapts to the road thanks to precision handling with safety made to last, steering control(1) and longevity(2).

tyres.name: Energy XM 2+
tyres.description: The MICHELIN Energy XM2+ long-lasting road tyre(1) delivers excellent robustness with wet braking performance made to last(3), for safety even when worn(2).

tyres.name: Primacy SUV+
tyres.description: Enjoy safety made to last with MICHELIN PRIMACY SUV+, keeping you and your loved ones safe in wet and dry conditions(1)(2)(3), from the first kilometer to the last(4).

tyres.name: Latitude Sport 3
tyres.description: Premium SUV tyre with robust design for dynamic handling, MICHELIN Latitude Sport 3 engineered for braking performance on wet roads and longevity.

tyres.name: LTX Trail ST
tyres.description: Take on paved roads and trails with the MICHELIN LTX Trail tyre, offering long-lasting on and off-road safety. Optimum braking performance when worn and safety in wet conditions(2).

tyres.name: Pilot Sport 5
tyres.description: Live each driving moment to the fullest, amplify sport performance made to last with the MICHELIN Pilot Sport 5 tyre, designed for high longevity(1).
